cmd.name: GAddPop
cmd.description: Increases the stronghold population by 10

cmd.name: RAddPop
cmd.description: Increases the stronghold population by 10

cmd.name: MAddPop
cmd.description: Increases the stronghold population by 10

cmd.name: IAddPop
cmd.description: Increases the stronghold population by 10

cmd.name: BAddPop
cmd.description: Increases the stronghold population by 10

cmd.name: HAddPop
cmd.description: Increases the stronghold population by 10

cmd.name: ECAddPop
cmd.description: Increases the stronghold population by 10

cmd.name: Free Beer
cmd.param: NameSet, Free Beer, default
cmd.description: Attracts 20 population to the stronghold (works only once)

cmd.name: Free Wine
cmd.param: NameSet,Free Wine, default
cmd.description: Explores a large area around the stronghold

cmd.name: Free Trade
cmd.param: NameSet, Free Trade, default
cmd.description: Increases the population of the stronghold to 100 (if current population is more than 70 then add 30)

cmd.name: Free Drinks
cmd.param: NameSet, Free Drinks, default
cmd.description: Attracts 10 population to the stronghold (works only once)

cmd.name: Gambling
cmd.param: NameSet, Gambling, default
cmd.description: Allows you to win 5000 or lose your investment (20% chance)

cmd.name: Gambler's Day
cmd.description: When a warrior kills a more experienced enemy he has a 35% chance to become the level of that enemy
cmd.param: ReqSet, Gambling, default, SetsPlr, GamblersDayChance, 35, NamePlr, Gambler's Day, default

cmd.name: Gambler's Test
cmd.description: Every warrior has a 4% chance to instantly kill a less experienced enemy
cmd.param: ReqSet, Gambling, default, SetsPlr, GamblersTestChance, 4, NamePlr, Gambler's Test, default

cmd.name: Gambler's Luck
cmd.description: Every dying warrior has a 20% chance to restore his health to full instead of dying
cmd.param: ReqSet, Gambling, default, SetsPlr, GamblersLuckChance, 20, NamePlr, Gambler's Luck, default

cmd.name: Import horses
cmd.param: NameSet, Import horses, default, SetsSet, levels/RScout, 10, ReqSet, Free Wine, default
cmd.description: All new scouts are level 10

cmd.name: Sell food
cmd.description: Sells 1000 food at the market for 500 gold
cmd.param: Free Drinks

cmd.name: Sell food
cmd.description: Sells 1000 food at the market for 500 gold

cmd.name: Sell food
cmd.description: Sells 1000 food at the market for 500 gold
cmd.param: Grain Trade

cmd.name: Sell food
cmd.description: Sells 1000 food at the market for 500 gold
cmd.param: Free Wine

cmd.name: Scout Area
cmd.description: Temporarily removes the fog of war around a chosen point and reveals any hidden warriors there
cmd.param: Free Wine

cmd.name: Expedition
cmd.description: Removes the fog of war in a chosen area and reveals any hidden warriors there. There can be only one such area at a given moment
cmd.param: ReqSet, Free Trade, default, NameSet, Expedition, default

cmd.name: investR
cmd.description: Adds 6000 gold to the stronghold
cmd.param: Free Wine

cmd.name: Roman Food Tax
cmd.description: Collects a food tax from the population of the stronghold
cmd.param: ReqSet, Free Wine, default, NameSet, Food Tax, default

cmd.name: Food Tax
cmd.description: Collects a food tax from the population of the stronghold
cmd.param: ReqSet, Free Beer, default, NameSet, Food Tax, default

cmd.name: Nordic trade routes
cmd.description: Equips all new warriors with Bear teeth amulets (+5 attack)
cmd.param: ReqSet, Free Beer, default, NameSet, Nordic trade routes, , SetsSet, items/Bear teeth amulet, 1

cmd.name: Belts of Might
cmd.description: Equips all new warriors with Belt of might amulets (+5 armor)
cmd.param: ReqSet, Nordic trade routes, , NameSet, Belts of Might, default, SetsSet, items/Belt of might, 1

cmd.name: getloan
cmd.description: Borrows 4000 gold at 10% interest
cmd.param: Free Beer

cmd.name: repayloan
cmd.description: Gives all current gold to repay the loan (without interest)

cmd.name: GTribute
cmd.param: ReqSet, Free Beer, default, NamePlr, Tribute, default
cmd.description: Gathers %s1 gold in each outpost you own. The amount of gold increases by 500 every 10 minutes (though not over 2000)

cmd.name: RTribute
cmd.param: ReqSet, Free Wine, default, NamePlr, Tribute, default
cmd.description: Gathers %s1 gold in each outpost you own. The amount of gold increases by 500 every 10 minutes (though not over 2000)

cmd.param: ReqSet, Free Wine, default, NamePlr, Tribute, default
cmd.description: Gathers %s1 gold in each outpost you own. The amount of gold increases by 500 every 10 minutes (though not over 2000)

cmd.description: Gathers %s1 gold in each outpost you own. The amount of gold increases by 500 every 10 minutes (though not over 2000)

cmd.description: Gathers %s1 gold in each outpost you own. The amount of gold increases by 500 every 10 minutes (though not over 2000)

cmd.description: Gathers %s1 gold in each outpost you own. The amount of gold increases by 500 every 10 minutes (though not over 2000)

cmd.description: Gathers %s1 gold in each outpost you own. The amount of gold increases by 500 every 10 minutes (though not over 2000)

cmd.description: Gathers %s1 gold in each outpost you own. The amount of gold increases by 500 every 10 minutes (though not over 2000)

cmd.name: Housing
cmd.description: Increases the maximum population of the stronghold by 20
cmd.param: ReqSet, Free Drinks, default, NameSet, Housing, default

cmd.name: Mercenary pact
cmd.param: ReqSet, Free Trade,default, NamePlr, Mercenary pact, default
cmd.description: Gives 40 gold to a hero each time one of his attached warriors dies

cmd.name: Slavery
cmd.param: ReqSet, Free Trade, default, NameSet, Slavery, default
cmd.description: Sell 50 population for 2000 gold

cmd.name: Call to arms
cmd.param: Free Drinks
cmd.description: Drafts 50 peasants, making them Militiamen

cmd.name: BuySlaves
cmd.description: Increases the stronghold population to maximum

cmd.name: GrainTrade
cmd.param: NameSet, Grain Trade, default
cmd.description: Slowly exchanges the food in the stronghold for gold

cmd.name: ReligiousFeast
cmd.param: ReqSet, Grain Trade,default, NameSet, Religious Feast,default
cmd.description: Heals the warriors around the townhall

cmd.name: Gossip
cmd.description: Temporarily removes the fog of war around a chosen point and reveals any hidden warriors there
cmd.param: Grain Trade

cmd.name: Hecatomb
cmd.param: ReqSet, Grain Trade,default
cmd.description: Increases the stronghold population to maximum

cmd.description: Increases the stronghold population by 10

cmd.param: NameSet, Grain Trade, default
cmd.description: Gathers 2000 food

cmd.description: Collects a food tax from population of the stronghold

cmd.description: Heals the warriors around the townhall

cmd.description: Heals the warriors around the townhall

cmd.param: ReqSet, Free Drinks, default, NameSet, Nordic trade routes, , SetsSet, items/Bear teeth amulet, 1

cmd.name: Germany Charm of Athena
cmd.description: All warriors above level 10 receive a Speed charm (+40% base speed) at their first kill
cmd.param: ReqSet, Grain Trade, default, NamePlr, Charm of Athena, default

cmd.name: Germany Veteran Health
cmd.description: Warriors receive a Veteran Health medal (+20% health) at their first kill
cmd.param: ReqSet, Grain Trade,default ,NamePlr, Veteran Health, default
